Package ProcessorCircuitSimulator.DataPath

Class DataMemory

java.lang.Object
ProcessorCircuitSimulator.DataPath.DataMemory
public class DataMemory extends Object
Represents the data memory component in a processor's data path.

  • Constructor Details

    • DataMemory

      public DataMemory()
      Constructs a new DataMemory object with an empty memory map.

  • Method Details

    • loadFromMemory

      public String loadFromMemory(String address)
      Loads a value from the memory at the specified address.
      Parameters:
      address - the memory address from which to load the value.
      Returns:
      the value stored at the specified memory address, or "0000" if the address is not found.

    • storeInMemory

      public void storeInMemory(String address, String value)
      Stores a value into the memory at the specified address.
      Parameters:
      address - the memory address where the value will be stored.
      value - the value to be stored in memory.

    • getMemory

      public String[][] getMemory()
      Retrieves the contents of the memory as a 2D array.
      Returns:
      a 2D array representing the memory contents, where each row contains an address-value pair.
